Recent technology has made home automation systems available for everyone, but you don’t have to dive in head first if you aren’t ready to automate your entire house. Start by swapping your traditional light bulbs for smart ones to see how home automation can enhance your life.

What Are Smart Light Bulbs?

Smart light bulbs work just like traditional ones. They give off various amounts of light so that you can easily see inside your house. You can insert them into various fixtures and customize the settings to meet your needs. The difference between smart light bulbs and traditional ones is that you can control the former through your phone. If you already have a home automation system such as Google Home or Alexa in place, you can control smart light bulbs with your voice.

Why Should You Start Using Smart Light Bulbs?

Automating various aspects of your home makes life more convenient. If you have smart light bulbs in your house, you no longer have to worry if you forget to turn the lights off in your kitchen after you go to bed or leave for vacation. You can control the lights in your home from your phone, and if you’re at home in bed and have a home automation system in place, you can even use your voice to turn the lights off. Other advantages of smart light bulbs include:

  • Routine: You can buy a light timer to control the lights in your house when you’re away, but these gadgets only work if you remember to set them every time you leave the house. You can set a light routine on your phone and customize it as necessary when you have smart light bulbs. They allow you to control the lights in your home remotely.
  • Control: Traditional light bulbs have one setting and give off a certain amount of light, Smart light bulbs give you more control over the lights in your home. You can dim them to create a romantic atmosphere for a date night in, or you can brighten the lights over your dining room table so that you can more easily see the pieces of your jigsaw puzzle. Complete control over the brightness of your lights is one of the primary advantages of smart light bulbs.
  • Sleep schedules: A significant portion of the population struggles to get enough quality sleep, and one way to improve your sleep cycle is to set a strict schedule. With smart light bulbs, you can set a schedule that turns all of your lights off at a designated time each night so that you know when to go to sleep. The lights turn on and wake you up at the same time every morning so you’re ready to start your day.

How Can Handyman Connection Help You With Smart Light Bulb Installation?

Installing smart light bulbs is slightly more complicated than replacing traditional bulbs because they have to be integrated into a home system to work. Trying to install smart light bulbs yourself will likely leave you frustrated when they aren’t working properly, so it’s best to call a professional for electrical repair services. At Handyman Connection, we have a team of licensed electricians who are well-versed in various aspects of home automation, including smart light bulbs. We can help you trade out all of the traditional light bulbs in your house and answer any questions you have about automating your home. 

Make an Appointment Today

If you’re ready to make the switch to smart light bulbs. the team of electricians at Handyman Connection is ready to help with installation to speed up the process. Contact us today when you need an electrician in Vaughan and schedule an appointment to install smart light bulbs.
